scenes.action_text: AMERICAN SNIPER Written by Jason Hall Based on the book by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice All gave some. Some gave all. 1 OVER BLACK 1 The groan of tank treads drowns out THE CALL TO PRAYER as an entire MARINE COMPANY advances over the top of us. 2 EXT. STREET, FALLUJAH, IRAQ - DAY 2 The sun melts over squat residences on a narrow street. MARINE COMPANY
